title: Fps drop
body: Yestrday i had ping lag. Normal i had 30ms yestrady was 300 (i test on other game and other games wotks normal )  nvrm....todymy ping is normal but fps drop ffrom 120-150  to 25 fps ....and fps drop hapend after maintenance. Thsi game is unplayble form me..

replies.body:
Since the maintenance was to address specific server issues, it's *very unlikely* to have affected your FPS. Most FPS issues are caused by driver problems or missing/corrupt League assets. As a first step, I recommend working through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

Let me know if those steps helped.
